docs.lead_paragraph: The U.N. Security Council on Friday kicked off a visit to spotlight Africa's worst humanitarian crisis as millions face hunger amid the Boko Haram insurgency in Nigeria and the Lake Chad region.

headline.main: UN Security Council Begins Africa Trip Focused on Boko Haram
headline.print_headline: UN Security Council Begins Africa Trip Focused on Boko Haram

docs.snippet: The U.N. Security Council on Friday kicked off a visit to spotlight Africa's worst humanitarian crisis as millions face hunger amid the Boko Haram insurgency in Nigeria and the Lake Chad region....

docs.lead_paragraph: A North Korean chemist deported from Malaysia accused police of threatening to kill his family unless he confessed to the assassination of the half-brother of North Korea's leader, calling it a plot to tarnish his country's honor.

headline.main: Deported Korean Says Malaysia Threatened to Harm His Family
headline.print_headline: Deported Korean Says Malaysia Threatened to Harm His Family

docs.snippet: A North Korean chemist deported from Malaysia accused police of threatening to kill his family unless he confessed to the assassination of the half-brother of North Korea's leader, calling it a plot to tarnish his country's honor....

docs.lead_paragraph: Thousands of people have rallied in the Georgian capital to protest a court verdict handing a top opposition-minded television station to a government-friendly owner.

headline.main: Thousands in Georgia Rally to Support Popular TV Station
headline.print_headline: Thousands in Georgia Rally to Support Popular TV Station

docs.snippet: Thousands of people have rallied in the Georgian capital to protest a court verdict handing a top opposition-minded television station to a government-friendly owner....

docs.lead_paragraph: Three suicide bombers set ablaze three fuel tankers in the center of Nigeria's northeastern city of Maiduguri before dawn Friday, officials said, just days before a planned visit by the U.N. Security Council.

headline.main: Suicide Bombers Destroy 3 Fuel Tankers in Northeast Nigeria
headline.print_headline: Suicide Bombers Destroy 3 Fuel Tankers in Northeast Nigeria

docs.snippet: Three suicide bombers set ablaze three fuel tankers in the center of Nigeria's northeastern city of Maiduguri before dawn Friday, officials said, just days before a planned visit by the U.N. Security Council....

docs.lead_paragraph: European shares dropped on Friday following disappointing company updates, although French stocks performed better after a poll eased anxieties over the impact on markets of the presidential election.

headline.main: European Shares Drop on Weaker Updates, French Banks Rise on Election Poll
headline.print_headline: European Shares Drop on Weaker Updates, French Banks Rise on Election Poll

docs.snippet: European shares dropped on Friday following disappointing company updates, although French stocks performed better after a poll eased anxieties over the impact on markets of the presidential election....

docs.lead_paragraph: They were just seven officers on a police force of more than 3,000, but the Baltimore detectives charged with theft, fraud and conspiracy had an outsized crime-fighting role in a city plagued by violence.

headline.main: Indictment Sends Ripple of Doubt Through Baltimore Cases
headline.print_headline: Indictment Sends Ripple of Doubt Through Baltimore Cases

docs.lead_paragraph: The Waikato Chiefs capitalised on the red card shown to Steve Luatua on the stroke of halftime to record a comfortable 41-26 Super Rugby victory over the Auckland Blues in Hamilton on Friday.
docs.snippet: The Waikato Chiefs capitalised on the red card shown to Steve Luatua on the stroke of halftime to record a comfortable 41-26 Super Rugby victory over the Auckland Blues in Hamilton on Friday....

docs.lead_paragraph: President Donald Trump toured a private religious school in Florida on Friday, praising it as an ideal institution for "disadvantaged children" while re-emphasizing that his education agenda will focus on school choice.

headline.main: Trump Tours Private School in Florida, Promoting Choice
headline.print_headline: Trump Tours Private School in Florida, Promoting Choice

docs.lead_paragraph: Sinn Fein, the Irish nationalist party, has fallen just short of becoming the largest party in elections for the Northern Ireland Assembly.

headline.main: Irish Nationalists Surge in Northern Ireland Election
headline.print_headline: Irish Nationalists Surge in Northern Ireland Election

docs.snippet: Sinn Fein, the Irish nationalist party, has fallen just short of becoming the largest party in elections for the Northern Ireland Assembly....

docs.lead_paragraph: Mexican-American photographer Maria Varela was present at some of the most dramatic moments of the Civil Rights Movement, capturing images of voting rights demonstrations in Alabama and efforts to create Head Start programs in poor, rural areas.

headline.main: Museum to Host Exhibit of Latina's Civil Rights Photography
headline.print_headline: Museum to Host Exhibit of Latina's Civil Rights Photography
